content: वैश्वदेव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Belonging to the Viśvedevas, <ab>q. v.</ab> --वं [विश्वेभ्यो देवेभ्यो देयो बलिः अण्] {@--1@} An offering made to the Viśvedevas. {@--2@} An offering to all deities (made by presenting oblations to fire before meals). --वी The eighth day of the second half of Māgha.
